summary: TRANSMISSION SLIPS/SHUTTERS/JERKS.  THE AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION HAS HAD PROBLEMS SINCE NEW.  THEY HAVE REPAIRED IT SEVERAL TIMES AND THE PROBLEM JUST COMES BACK.
